input.sentences: what a lovely hotel | this hotel is vast and silent but beautiful !
this is where i get to live in style and have a luxury life for four days .
the shopping is so fulfilling with tons of styles and colors to choose from .
here is where the guests all get to sit together and get to know one another .
this is what i received when i checked in | lavish !
output.sentences: The exterior of the building was somber.
A doorman waited outside the hotel.
Inside the hotel, a clothing boutique offered beautiful dresses.
In the next room, a banquet table awaited its guests.
A tray of goodies were laid out for the upcoming party.
